TopicTitle: Truncated service bays & taller truncated fuel tanks

Articles.Content: I think a fairly large gap in KSP's parts is the lack of truncated (meaning they get thinner along their length) service bays.  They would open up a lot of new possibilities for spacecraft that have to ascend through an atmosphere.  I would also love taller truncated fuel tanks, although this is mainly so I could build rockets shaped like the N1.
They could do something like in Spaceflight simulator where the fuel tanks auto adapt.
